entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 06:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -32.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -35.9°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
